summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating they will be traveling for work until September 20, 2019. The subject line references a discussion about why federal authorities cannot forfeit Jeffrey Epstein's mansion.
keyFacts: The email is an out-of-office reply from an individual at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The subject line references a discussion titled 'Why the Feds Cannot Forfeit Jeffrey Epstein's Mansion'.
The sender was on work travel and expected to return on September 20, 2019.
The email suggests ongoing legal or procedural discussions regarding the forfeiture of Jeffrey Epstein's property by federal authorities.
The document is dated September 17, 2019, which is after Epstein's death in August 2019.
